author: Marianne Klowak
title: Alcoholics Anonymous, mental health providers find creative ways to deliver services during pandemic
description: As social distancing measures are enforced to fight the spread of the coronavirus, community groups providing addiction and mental health support are finding new ways to deliver their services.
content:
Alcoholics Anonymous usually relies on face-to-face meetings to help those who are strugging with addiction.
But hundreds of people who rely on the organization's support groups run are finding new and creative ways to connect during the social distancing fo… [+4543 chars]
